Prefix
MINFO

Header file for the implementation to gather information on the foxBMS-Master and its connected peripherals on the master PCB.

Definition in file masterinfo.h.

enum MINFO_DEBUG_PROBE_CONNECTION_STATE_e

Enumerator

no debug probe connected
